channel.title: I need help on a song name! -DJC
channel.description:
I just finished a track that's kind of a mix of ambient and future bass, but I couldn't think of a suitable name for it! Any ideas? (Solemn was one Name I thought of bc of the main mood, but Im not convinced it's a perfect name yet)
[https://app.auxy.co/projects/K_Scp7kQC5Hp606Jm4h_WA==](https://app.auxy.co/projects/K_Scp7kQC5Hp606Jm4h_WA==)

item.title: I need help on a song name! -DJC
item.dc:creator: DJC
item.description:
Ok, I think I am going to go with nightfall, but I appreciate all of your suggestionsüòÅ. Thanks again

Read full topic
